body:
Hi
everybody,




I’m looking
for a Radiance model of a glossy display. 
We already measured a matte display
by means of Gonio-Photometer and made the respective Radiance model (presented
in Radiance Workshop 2008). 
It would be appreciated if somebody has the angle-dependent
reflection characteristics of a glossy display which could be shared to
make a comparative simulation study of both models.






Cheers,


Niloofar


 PS: Sorry for the typo in the last title
___
